{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10841v1", "title": "Some four-dimensional orthogonal invariants", "summary": "Let $p$ be an odd prime and $\mathbb{F}_p$ be the prime field of order $p$.
Consider a $2$-dimensional orthogonal group $G$ over $\mathbb{F}_p$ acting on
the standard representation $V$ and the dual space $V^*$. We compute the
invariant ring $\mathbb{F}_p[V\oplus V^*]^G$ via explicitly exhibiting a
minimal generating set. Our method finds an application of $s$-invariants
appeared in covariant theory of finite groups.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-15T03:59:00Z"}
